name: Unciv Potato
description:
original game: https://yairm210.itch.io/unciv

v 4.0.15 patch1(a) Potato:

- installs as different package , so you can keep both: Unciv and Unciv Potato

- gameplay is the same as Unciv, so original saves can be used

- adds screen resolution 600x400,  it is default for Android now

- adds midi music system with lot of tracks. but 10x less size than 1 downloaded one
